titles.title: I can see it clearly now

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
I can see it clearly now
There's a reason for this sound - It's Jesus
At the core of who I am
Is the risen son of man - It's Jesus

verse.name: p1
verse.lines:
You're like no other for your love is greater
And you are the centre of it all

verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
It's all about you, It's all about you
It's all about you, It's all about you

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
I exist to bring you praise
And to shout no other name but Jesus

verse.name: b1
verse.lines:
You are the first, You are the last
You are my future
'Cause you took my past
You are the reason why I sing
